class cardlib.Hand¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent a players hand

add_card(card)¶

Adds a card to the players hand

Parameters

card (PlayingCard) – A playing card

best_poker_hand(table_cards=[])¶

A method that creates a poker hand object and returns the combination of the 5 best playing cards

Parameters

table_cards (list) – A list of the cards on the table.

Returns

A poker hand of the 5 best cards out of the cards on hand and card on the table.

Return type

PokerHand

drop_cards(discards)¶

Drop the desired cards from the players hand

Parameters

discards (list) – A list of desired discards

show_hand()¶

Method that displays the hand in the command window

sort()¶

Sorts the hand from the lowest to the highest card

class cardlib.PokerHand(cards)¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent a players hand

check_checks()¶

Loops through the checks and returns a tuple of the best cards and what hand type they represent

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards

:type list

:return Tuple of the best cards and their corresponding hand type. :return type: tuple

static check_flush(cards)¶

Check for the best flush out of the given list

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

None if no flush is found, else the highest card in the flush

Return type

tuple

static check_four_of_a_kind(cards)¶

Check for the best four of a kind and highest single card and returns them

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

None if no four of a kind is found, else the value of the four of a kind and the highest remaining card

Return type

tuple

static check_full_house(cards)¶

Checks for the best full house in a list of cards (may be more than just 5)

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards

Type

list

Returns

None if no full house is found, else a tuple of the values of the triple and pair.

Return type

tuple

static check_high_card(cards)¶

Check for the highest card out of the given list

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

The 5 best cards out of the list in descending order.

Return type

tuple

static check_pair(cards)¶

Check for the best pair out of the given list

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

None of no pair is found, else the value of the highest pair and value of the highest three remaining

cards. :return type: tuple

static check_straight(cards)¶

Checks for the best straight flush in a list of cards (may be more than just 5) :param cards: A list of playing cards. :type: list

Returns

None if no straight is found, else the value of the top card.

Return type

tuple

static check_straight_flush(cards)¶

Checks for the best straight flush in a list of cards (may be more than just 5)

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

None if no straight flush is found, else the value of the top card.

Return type

Tuple

static check_three_of_a_kind(cards)¶

Check for the best three of a kind of the given list

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

None if no three of a kind is found, else the highest flush

Return type

tuple

static check_two_pair(cards)¶

Check for the best flush out of the given list

Parameters

cards – A list of playing cards.

Type

list

Returns

None if no two pair is found, else the value of the cards in each pair and the highest remaining card

Return type

tuple
